title: BRIEF-Choice Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $426 Mln Portfolio Disposition
text:
BRIEF-Choice Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $426 Mln Portfolio Disposition

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 20, 2019 08:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Choice Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $426 Mln Portfolio Disposition Sept 20 (Reuters) - Choice Properties Real Estate Investment Trust : * CHOICE PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST ANNOUNCES $426 MILLION PORTFOLIO DISPOSITION * CHOICE PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - AGREEMENT TO SELL A 30 PROPERTY PORTFOLIO FOR ABOUT $426 MILLION TO THIRD PARTY PURCHASER * CHOICE PROPERTIES REIT - PURCHASER HAS OPTION TO ACQUIRE TWO ADDITIONAL STAND-ALONE RETAIL PROPERTIES FOR AN AGGREGATE SALE PRICE OF ABOUT $29 MILLION * CHOICE PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - PROCEEDS FROM TRANSACTION WILL BE USED TO REPAY DEBT

BRIEF-Choice Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $426 Mln Portfolio Disposition
description: BRIEF-Choice Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces $426 Mln Portfolio Disposition
